EmailTemplate.name: The St.Andrews Society
EmailTemplate.subject: The St Andrews Society Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents
Albeit outside of school, there is an event coming up - it looks like being a lot of fun and it's certainly family friendly. I wanted to forward the information attached in the case that it may be of interest to you.
Best
Melissa
Melissa Salter Head of Admissions The International School of Moscow Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00Tel: +7 (903) 722 14 91 Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group
*Disclaimer:* This message (including any attachments) contains confidential information intended for a specific individual and purpose, and is protected by law. If you are not the intended recipient, you should delete this message and are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, or distribution of this message, or the taking of any action based on it, is strictly prohibited.
